attributes.action: Prevent St. Helens council from changing from 2 week to 4 week bin collections
attributes.background: St. Helens council have already decided to wrongly charge extra on top of council tax to collect and recycle green waste they are now proposing to move from bi weekly to four weekly bin collections.  This will off course lead to fly tipping and increase in vermin.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local bin collections are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
